submission.message:
Thank you for submitting this form.

Your reference number is {summary_ref}.

save.message: Your  application has been saved. To resume it, use  the following link.
save.subject: Resume application

58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ',''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: html 17
props.content: Portsmouth City Council Recruitment Agency will process your personal information in line with national data protection legislation. The details you give us will be held in a secure system and will only be shared with other organisations where the law allows. To find out more read our data protection policy

props.label: html 1
props.content: Thank you for your interest in joining our internal agency. Jobs vary from short to long term, and are up to 37 hours per week. To make sure that we match your skills and experience quickly and accurately please complete this form. Once we've put your form through our selection process we'll contact you.

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: Tick the traits that you feel describe you best (maximum of 4)
html 4
props.content: You and a colleague have been working on a report together. The deadline is tomorrow. You have just got to work and found out that your colleague is ill and wont be in today. The report is almost complete but your colleague was due to add a few extra pieces of information to it. You arent as familiar with this information as your colleague. You were both planning on meeting with your manager this afternoon to talk her through the report before you submit it to your Director. Do you

props.maximumChoicesMessage: Please select no more than _max_value_ choices
props.label: You and a colleague have been working on a report together. The deadline is tomorrow. You have just got to work and found out that your colleague is ill and wont be in today. The report is almost complete but your colleague was due to add a few extra pieces of information to it. You arent as familiar with this information as your colleague.  You were both planning on meeting with your manager this afternoon to talk her through the report before you submit it to your Director. Do you

listOfValues.label: Ask around the team to find someone who understands this information better than you, and ask them to explain it to you before you add to the report.
Speak with your manager to find out whether it would be better to wait for your colleague to return before you meet.
Try and find the relevant information yourself and put it in the report where you think it needs to be; discuss this specific information with your line manager later.
Inform your manager that your colleague is off sick and ask whether she could help you find the information and help put it in the report when you meet later.
Meet with the manager with the current version of the report; it can be submitted without the additions

props.label: html 2
props.content:
POLICY STATEMENT ON THE RECRUITMENT AND SELECTION OF EX-OFFENDERS

The city council will make all efforts to prevent discrimination against any of its staff, potential staff or users of its services, regardless of race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, age, disability or offending background that does not create risk to children and vulnerable adults.

The city council complies fully with the Disclosure and Barring Code of Practice.

The city council ensures that all those involved in the recruitment and selection process are suitably trained. We also ensure that they have received appropriate guidance and training in the relevant legislation, e.g. the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974.,/p>

The city council will ensure that an open and measured discussion takes place at interview regarding any offences or other matters relevant to the post. Failure to reveal information that is directly relevant and unfiltered to the post may lead to an offer being withdrawn or dismissal if already in post.

The city council undertakes to discuss any matter revealed in a Disclosure with the applicant before making a decision not to appoint.

Having a criminal record will not necessarily bar applicants from working with the city council. This will depend on the nature of the position and the circumstances and background of the offences.

On the 29th May 2013 the Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) announced that they will now be removing certain, specified, old and minor offences from criminal record certificates issued from this date.

The DBS now has filtering rules, along with a list of offences that will never be filtered, full details of these can be found at the DBS website www.gov.uk/dbs this filtering process will identify and remove convictions and cautions which should no longer be disclosed on DBS certificates due to this change in legislation.

The filtering rules for criminal record check certificates have been defined as following:

For those 18 or over at the time of the offence:

An adult conviction will be removed from a DBS criminal record certificate if:

  • 11 years have elapsed since the date of conviction; and
  • it is the persons only offence, and
  • it did not result in a custodial sentence.

Even then, it will only be removed if it does not appear on the list of offences relevant to safeguarding. If a person has more than one offence, then details of all their convictions will always be included.

An adult caution will be removed after 6 years have elapsed since the date of the caution and if it does not appear on the list of offences relevant to safeguarding.

For those under 18 at the time of the offence:

  • The same rules apply as for adult convictions, except that the elapsed time period is 5.5 years
  • The same rules apply as for adult cautions, except that the elapsed time period is 2 years.

Certain offences will come under a list that will never be filtered, and will always show on a check. These offences have been compiled into a list by DBS. This list includes a range of offences which are serious and which relate to sexual offending, violent offending and/or safeguarding. The full list and full guidance can be found here www.gov.uk/dbs which should answer any questions you have.

Where Disclosure forms part of the recruitment and selection process the city council strongly encourages all applicants who are called for interview to provide details of their criminal record to the interviewing panel, following the filtering guidelines above. This information will only be seen by those who need to see it as part of the selection process.

Information requested under the Rehabilitation of Offenders Act 1974 (Exception) Order 1975.

Normally under the above Act, some criminal convictions do not have to be disclosed after a period of time when they become spent. This does NOT apply to posts that are listed under the above act or meet one of the regulated activity criteria in relation to children under the age of 18 or adults.

Due to the nature of the work a post that is eligible for a DBS check is made exempt from these rules by the above Order. This means that you MUST answer the relevant sections below about current and all other previous criminal convictions following the filtering guidance above. This will be treated in the strictest confidence as specified in the Disclosure and Barring Service Code of Practice, and will be considered only in relation to this application. Failure to disclose this information could lead to your application being rejected, or if you are appointed, to dismissal if it is subsequently learnt that you have a criminal conviction.
